title: Video: Eyedress – Don’t Disappear
body:
**Eyedress**’ videos seem to be getting better and better.

The visuals for his track _Don’t Disappear_ are playful, quietly sombre and actual pretty rich in subject matter. He seems to be throwing a load of stuff at the wall at the moment, and a large proportion of the ‘stuff’, is sticking.
